name: ConceptDraw DIAGRAM XML SlideShow
summary: A CDSX file is a diagram slide show created by ConceptDraw PRO, an application for creating simple and complex technical drawings. It stores the contents of a slide show, including diagram pages and settings, in the XML standard. ConceptDraw users save diagrams as slide shows to make presenting their business data diagrams, illustrations, charts, etc easier.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
